languages.text: {n}Маражай делает небрежный жест, одновременно возвращая пластину на положенное место.{/n} "Я закончил. Дай знать, когда соберешься кого-то убивать — я не терплю затишья".
{n}Marazhai makes a casual gesture, in the same motion returning the plate to its proper place.{/n} "I am finished. Let me know when you are planning to kill someone — I cannot stand this lull."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай делает небрежный жест, одновременно возвращая пластину на положенное место.{/n} "Я закончил. Дай знать, когда соберешься кого-то убивать — я не терплю затишья".

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋做了个漫不经心的手势，将护甲板装回了原来的位置。{/n}“我已经说完了。如果你什么时候打算杀人，和我说一声，我可受不了这样无所事事。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai makes a casual gesture, in the same motion returning the plate to its proper place.{/n} "I am finished. Let me know when you are planning to kill someone — I cannot stand this lull."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋做了个漫不经心的手势，将护甲板装回了原来的位置。{/n}“我已经说完了。如果你什么时候打算杀人，和我说一声，我可受不了这样无所事事。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは何気なく手を動かし、同じ動作でプレートを元の位置に戻す。{/n}「これで終わりだ。誰かを殺すつもりなら教えろ。こんな締まらない状態は耐えられないんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai makes a casual gesture, in the same motion returning the plate to its proper place.{/n} "I am finished. Let me know when you are planning to kill someone — I cannot stand this lull."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは何気なく手を動かし、同じ動作でプレートを元の位置に戻す。{/n}「これで終わりだ。誰かを殺すつもりなら教えろ。こんな締まらない状態は耐えられないんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai hace un ademán de indiferencia, aprovechando el mismo gesto para volver a encajar la pieza de armadura en su sitio.{/n} «He terminado. Avísame cuando estés pensando en matar a alguien; no soporto este tedio».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai makes a casual gesture, in the same motion returning the plate to its proper place.{/n} "I am finished. Let me know when you are planning to kill someone — I cannot stand this lull."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai hace un ademán de indiferencia, aprovechando el mismo gesto para volver a encajar la pieza de armadura en su sitio.{/n} «He terminado. Avísame cuando estés pensando en matar a alguien; no soporto este tedio».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai esquisse un geste désinvolte tout en replaçant la plaque d'armure sur son épaule.{/n} « Pour ma part, j'ai dit tout ce que j'avais à dire. Faites-moi savoir quand vous compterez tuer quelqu'un. L'oisiveté ne me vaut rien. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai makes a casual gesture, in the same motion returning the plate to its proper place.{/n} "I am finished. Let me know when you are planning to kill someone — I cannot stand this lull."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai esquisse un geste désinvolte tout en replaçant la plaque d'armure sur son épaule.{/n} « Pour ma part, j'ai dit tout ce que j'avais à dire. Faites-moi savoir quand vous compterez tuer quelqu'un. L'oisiveté ne me vaut rien. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai macht eine beiläufige Geste und drückt die Platte dann wieder in ihre richtige Position.{/n} "Ich bin fertig. Teilt mir mit, wenn Ihr vorhabt, jemanden zu töten – ich kann mit Eurer Passivität nichts anfangen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai makes a casual gesture, in the same motion returning the plate to its proper place.{/n} "I am finished. Let me know when you are planning to kill someone — I cannot stand this lull."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai macht eine beiläufige Geste und drückt die Platte dann wieder in ihre richtige Position.{/n} "Ich bin fertig. Teilt mir mit, wenn Ihr vorhabt, jemanden zu töten – ich kann mit Eurer Passivität nichts anfangen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai makes a casual gesture, in the same motion returning the plate to its proper place.{/n} "I am finished. Let me know when you are planning to kill someone — I cannot stand this lull."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, alelade bir el hareketi yapıyor ve aynı aleladelikle plakayı ait olduğu yere oturtuyor.{/n} "İşim bitti. Birilerini öldürmeyi planladığında bana haber ver. Bu durgunluğa tahammül edemiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai makes a casual gesture, in the same motion returning the plate to its proper place.{/n} "I am finished. Let me know when you are planning to kill someone — I cannot stand this lull."
